body_html: Hi @pkuCactus. In my case I had pytorch compiled against different libstdc++ to what python was loading because we have some custom gcc set up. We resolved it by setting up anaconda (initially I tried it on bare python) and compiled pytorch against anaconda's gcc and Intel MKL.
body_text: Hi @pkuCactus. In my case I had pytorch compiled against different libstdc++ to what python was loading because we have some custom gcc set up. We resolved it by setting up anaconda (initially I tried it on bare python) and compiled pytorch against anaconda's gcc and Intel MKL.
body: Hi @pkuCactus. In my case I had pytorch compiled against different libstdc++ to what python was loading because we have some custom gcc set up. We resolved it by setting up anaconda (initially I tried it on bare python) and compiled pytorch against anaconda's gcc and Intel MKL.
